roleset.name: protect
roleset.note: SHIELD-V NOTES: No VN class. (from shield.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: Researchers at Sandia National Laboratories in Albuquerque, N.M., reported they-1 went so far as [*trace*-1]-2 to take a ``cold fusion'' experiment and three neutron detectors into a tunnel under 300 feet of granite *trace*-2 to shield the detectors from cosmic rays.

example.name: unstated danger
example.text: But there were enough promoters announcing the end of history (in this case suspension of normal laws of economic gravity) for society-1 to continue *trace*-1 shielding its eyes.
